div.p:
evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati su
bhagavane sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi
bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā
etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desessā
mi taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evaṃ
bhante ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca

idha bhikkhave asutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ athassāvī ariyadhammassa
akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurissāvīnaṃ adassā
sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito pa
thaviṃ pathavito sañjānāti pathaviṃ pathavito sañatvā pathaviṃ mañati patha
viyā mañati pathavīto mañati pathavī meti mañati pathaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato sañatvā ā
paṃ mañati āpasmiṃ mañati āpato mañati āpaṃ meti mañati āpaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato sañjā
nāti tejaṃ tejaṃto sañatvā tejaṃ mañati tejasmiṃ mañati tejato mañati tejaṃ meti mañati te abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vā
yaṃ vāyato sañjānāti vāyaṃ vāyato sañatvā vāyaṃ mañati vāyasmiṃ mañati vāyato mañati vāyaṃ meti mañati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appari
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

bhūte bhūtato sañāñjānāti bhūte bhūtato sañatvā bhūte mañati bhūtasmiṃ mañati bhūtato mañati bhūte meti bhūte abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi deve devato sañjānāti deva devato sañatvā deve pañati devesu mañati devato mañati deve meti mañati deve abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi pajāpattiṃ pajāpatito sañjānāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito sañatvā pajāpattiṃ mañati pajāpatismiṃ mañati pajāpatito mañati pajāpatiṃ meti maña
ti pajāpattiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tatissā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato sañañjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato sañatvā brahmaṃ mañati brahmahmaṃ ni mañati brahma
to mañati brahmaṃ meti mañati brahma abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato sañāñjānāti ābhasare ābhassarato sañatvā
ābhassare mañati ābhassaresu mañati ābhassarato mañāti ābhassaraṃ meti mañati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sa
ñjānāti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sañatvā subhakiṇhe mañati subhakiṇhesu mañati subhakiṇhato mañati subhakiṇhe meti mañati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi vehapapphale vehapphalato sañjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato sañatvā vehapphale mañati vehapphalesu mañati vehapphalato mañati vehapphale
meti mañati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto sañāñjānāti abhibhūṃ abhibhūto sañatvā abhibhuṃ mañati abhibhusmiṃ maña
ti abhibhūto mañati abhibhuṃ meti mañati abhibhu abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcañcāyatanato
sañjanāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañatvā ākāsānañcāyataṃnaṃ mañati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ mañati ākāsānañcāyatanato mañati ākā
sānañcāyataṃnaṃ meti mañati ākāsānañcāyataṃnaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viñāṇañāñcāyatanaṃ viñānañcāyatanato sañjāti viñāṇañcā
yatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanato sañatvā viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ mañati viñāṇañcāyatanasmi mañati viñāṇañcāyatanato mañati viñāṇañcayatanaṃ me
ti mañati viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcañāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanato sañjānāti ākiñcañāyatanaṃ
ākiñcañāyatanato sañatvā ākiñcañāyatanaṃ mañati ākiñcañāyatanasmiṃ mañati ākiñcañāyatanato mañati ākiñcāñāyatanaṃ meti mañati ā
kiñcañāyatanaṃ ābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevañānāsañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyanato sañjānāti nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ nevasañānā
sañāyatanato sañatvā nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanasmiṃ mañāti nevasañānāsañāyatanato mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ meti
mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ ābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjānāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañatvā diṭṭhaṃ mañati diṭṭhasmiṃ maña
ti diṭṭhato mañati diṭṭha meti mañati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñataṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato sañāñjānāti sutaṃ sutato sañatvā sutaṃ mañati sutasmiṃ ma
ñati sutato mañati sutaṃ meti mañati sutaṃ abhinanda taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutato sañjānāti mutaṃ mutato sañatvā mutaṃ mañati mutasmiṃ mañati
mutato mañati mutaṃ meti mañati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kisa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viñātaṃ viñātato sañjānāti viñataṃ viñātato sañatvā viñātaṃ mañati viñātasmiṃ mañā
ti viñātato pañati viñātaṃ meti mañati viñātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ekattaṃ ekattato sañjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato sañatvā ekattaṃ mañati ekatasmiṃ
mañati ekkattato mañati ekattaṃ meti mañati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato sañjāti nānattaṃ nānattato saña
tvā nānattaṃ mañati nānattasmiṃ mañati nānattato mañati nānattaṃ meti mañati nānattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbhato sañjā
nāti sabbhaṃ sabbhato sañatvā sabbhaṃ mañati sabbhasmiṃ mañati sabbhato mañati sabbhaṃ meti mañati sabbhaṃ bhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi niñanaṃ ni
bbānato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañatvā nibbānaṃ mañati nibbānasmiṃ mañati nibbānato mañati nibbānaṃ meti mañati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti
vadāmi assutavanta puthujjanavasena pathamanamayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhavo bhikkhu sekkho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi pathavī pathavi
to abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ mā mañi pathaviyā mā mañi pathavito mā mañi pathavi meti mā mañi pathaviṃ māabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pari
ñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñānañcāyata
naṃ ākiñcāñāyatanaṃ nevasañcāñānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ niñcanato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhi
ñāya nibbānaṃ mā mañi nibbānasmiṃ mā mañi nibbānato mā mañi nibbāna meti mā mañi nibbānaṃ māabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhavesena dutiya
nayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu ahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikhiṇabhavasaṃyojano samadañā vimutto
sopi pathavi pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ
kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ teja vāyaṃ bhute deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ akāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñā
nañcāyatanaṃ ākiñāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ suttaṃ mutaṃ viñāta ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khiṇāsavavasena
tatiyanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā karaṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vi
mutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañāti pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhi
nandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā ...la... āmaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatī brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ viñānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na ma
ñati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato pana mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ mebhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vitarāgattā khiṇāsavavasena catutthanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhi
to

yomi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anappattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānā
ti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vī
tadosattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhūṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñānañcāyatanaṃ ā
kiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sūtaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya
nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā khiṇāsavavasena pa
ñcamanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vūsitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vimū
tto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañati pa
thaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā ...la... āmaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale ābhibhuṃ ā
kāsanañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato a
bhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vitamo
hattā khiṇāsavavasena chaṭṭhanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na ma
ñati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābha
ssare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhūṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ
nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañāti nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati
nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetū pariñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pa
thaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañati pathavi nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa
jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā hagā pitinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ
vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcayatanaṃ viñānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevañānā
sañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na maña
ti nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato
sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi satthuvesena aṭṭhamanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito idamavoca bhagavā attamanā te
bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanduti mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ nitthitaṃ pathamaṃ
